comment: Alternate proof of ~ mobidv directly from its analogues ~ albidv and ~ exbidv , using deduction style. Note the proof structure, similar to ~ mobi . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) Reduce axiom dependencies and shorten proof. Remove dependency on ~ ax-6 , ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-12 by adapting proof of ~ mobid . (Revised by BJ, 26-Sep-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
